00012 ControlWin::ControlWin(QWidget *p, Qt::WindowFlags f)
00013     : QWidget(p,f)
00014 {
00015     pausedValidRdyLbl = cycleCtLbl = tsLbl = currentStateLbl = transitionCountLbl = schedWavesLbl = aoWavesLbl = 0;
00016     QTimer *timer_ctls = new QTimer(this);
00017 
00018     setWindowTitle("FSM Emulator - Controls");
00019     QGridLayout *l = new QGridLayout(this);
00020     QGroupBox *gb = new QGroupBox("Analog Input Controls", this);
00021     l->addWidget(gb, 0, 0);
00022     QGridLayout *l2 = new QGridLayout(gb);
00023     ComediAIView *ai = new ComediAIView("/dev/comedi0", 0.5, 4.5, gb);
00024     l2->addWidget(ai, 0, 0);
00025     connect(timer_ctls, SIGNAL(timeout()), ai, SLOT(refreshView()));
00026 
00027     gb = new QGroupBox("DIO Controls", this);
00028     l->addWidget(gb, 1, 0);
00029     l2 = new QGridLayout(gb);
00030     ComediDIOView *dio = new ComediDIOView("/dev/comedi0", gb);
00031     gb->setToolTip(dio->toolTip());
00032     l2->addWidget(dio, 0, 0);
00033     connect(timer_ctls, SIGNAL(timeout()), dio, SLOT(refreshView()));
00034  
00035     gb = new QGroupBox("AO Voltages", this);
00036     l->addWidget(gb, 2, 0);
00037     l2 = new QGridLayout(gb);
00038     ComediAOView *ao = new ComediAOView("/dev/comedi0", gb);
00039     l2->addWidget(ao, 0, 0);
00040     connect(timer_ctls, SIGNAL(timeout()), ao, SLOT(refreshView()));
00041     
00042     gb = new QGroupBox("Misc. Stats", this);
00043     l->addWidget(gb, 3, 0);
00044     l2 = new QGridLayout(gb);
00045     QLabel *tmpl;
00046     int col = 0, row = 0;
00047     fastClk = new QCheckBox("'Fast Clock' mode", gb);
00048     fastClk->setToolTip("In 'Fast Clock' mode, emulated time passes as quickly as possible\n(without any sleeps inside the periodic loop)");
00049     l2->addWidget(fastClk, row, col++, 1, 8, Qt::AlignLeft);
00050     connect(fastClk, SIGNAL(stateChanged(int)), this, SLOT(fastClkSlot(int)));
00051     ++row;  col = 0;
00052     tmpl = new QLabel("FSM 0: ", gb);
00053     pausedValidRdyLbl = new QLabel("", gb);
00054     l2->addWidget(tmpl, row, col++, Qt::AlignRight);
00055     l2->addWidget(pausedValidRdyLbl, row, col++, Qt::AlignLeft);

00057     l2->addWidget(tmpl, row, col++, Qt::AlignRight);

00061     l2->addWidget(tmpl, row, col++, Qt::AlignRight);

00072     int tmpCol = col;

00074     ++row, col = 0;
00075     l2->addWidget(w, row, col, 1, tmpCol, Qt::AlignLeft);

00112     timer_ctls->start();

00114 
00115 void ControlWin::updateMiscStats()
00116 {
00117     struct FSMStats st;
00118     fsm_get_stats(0, &st);
00119     fastClk->blockSignals(true);
00120     fastClk->setCheckState(st.isFastClk ? Qt::Checked : Qt::Unchecked);
00121     fastClk->blockSignals(false);
00122     QString pvr = "";
00123     if (st.isValid) {
00124         pvr += "valid";
00125         if (st.isPaused) pvr += ", <font color='#aaaa00'><b>paused</b></font>";
00126         else pvr += ", <font color='green'><b>running</b></font>";
00127         if (st.readyForTrial) pvr += ", <font color='#00ffff'><b>ready for trial</b></font>";
00128     } else
00129         pvr += "<font color='red'>invalid or not specified</font>";
00130     pausedValidRdyLbl->setText(pvr);
00131     cycleCtLbl->setText(QString::number(st.cycle));
00132     tsLbl->setText(QString::number(st.ts, 'f', 3)+"s");
00133     currentStateLbl->setText(QString::number(st.state));
00134     transitionCountLbl->setText(QString::number(st.transitions));
00135     QString clk = "";
00136     if (st.clockLatchTime > 0.) {
00137         clk = QString::number(st.clockLatchTime) + "s";
00138         if (st.isClockLatched) clk += ", <font color='red'><b>clock latched</b></font>";
00139         else clk += QString(", <font color='#009900'>clock not latched</font>, latch at: ") + QString::number(st.latchAt);
00140     } else
00141         clk = "(off)";
00142 
00143     clockLatchLbl->setText(clk);
00144     enqInpEvtsLbl->setText(QString::number(st.enqInpEvts));
00145     if (st.activeSchedWaves) {
00146         QString txt("");
00147         int w;
00148         while ((w=ffs(st.activeSchedWaves))) {
00149             --w;
00150             st.activeSchedWaves &= ~(0x1<<w);
00151             txt += QString::number(w) + " ";
00152         }
00153         schedWavesLbl->setText(QString("<b>") + txt + "</b>");
00154     } else
00155         schedWavesLbl->setText("(none)");
00156 
00157     if (st.activeAOWaves) {
00158         QString txt("");
00159         int w;
00160         while ((w=ffs(st.activeAOWaves))) {
00161             --w;
00162             st.activeAOWaves &= ~(0x1<<w);
00163             txt += QString::number(w) + " ";
00164         }
00165         aoWavesLbl->setText(QString("<b>") + txt + "</b>");
00166     } else
00167         aoWavesLbl->setText("(none)");
00168 
00169     if (lastPlayedSounds.size()) {
00170         QTime now = QTime::currentTime();
00171         QString txt("");
00172         for(SndTimeMap::iterator it = lastPlayedSounds.begin();
00173             it != lastPlayedSounds.end(); ++it)
00174         {
00175             if (now.msecsTo(it->second) <= 0) {
00176                 lastPlayedSounds.erase(it);
00177             } else
00178                 txt += QString::number(it->first) + " ";
00179         }
00180         if (txt.length())
00181             sndsLbl->setText(QString("<b>") + txt + "</b>");        
00182         else 
00183             sndsLbl->setText("(none)");            
00184     } else {
00185         sndsLbl->setText("(none)");
00186     }
00187 }
00188 
00189 void ControlWin::triggeredSound(unsigned id)
00190 {
00191     lastPlayedSounds[id] = QTime::currentTime().addSecs(3);
00192     updateMiscStats();
00193 }
00194 void ControlWin::untriggeredSound(unsigned id)
00195 {
00196     lastPlayedSounds.erase(id);
00197     updateMiscStats();
00198 }
00199 
00200 void ControlWin::resetAllSoundStats()
00201 {
00202     lastPlayedSounds.clear();
00203     updateMiscStats();
00204 }
00205 
00206 void ControlWin::fastClkSlot(int state)
00207 {
00208     setFastClock(state == Qt::Checked);
00209 }
